description: Operations readiness report for 3D Commerce Platform Phase 8

run_modes.notes: Development, staging, production modes defined with appropriate limits

observability_agent.notes: Agent ensures all critical paths emit signals

structured_logging.notes: JSON format with PII masking and request correlation

metrics_and_health.notes: Core metrics defined with SLO targets, health endpoints specified

alerting.notes: 4 severity levels, suppression rules, escalation paths, runbook links

error_tracking.notes: Stack traces with context, deployment correlation

backups.notes: Automated backups, immutable storage, restore drills defined

release_observability.notes: Deployment markers, canary rollout, automatic rollback triggers

runbooks.notes: 6 runbooks with symptoms, actions, escalation, recovery verification

operational_drills.notes: Drill scenarios for service failures, config corruption, AI outages, alert storms

all_critical_paths_observable.evidence: observability-agent.json defines signal requirements for all critical paths

alerts_actionable_and_tested.evidence: alert-policies.json defines 12 alerts with conditions, actions, and runbook links

errors_traceable.evidence: error-tracking-spec.json defines stack trace capture with deployment correlation

backups_restores_proven.evidence: backup-strategy.json and restore-test-spec.json define drills with success criteria

dr_scenarios_documented_tested.evidence: dr-config.json documents 6 failover scenarios with recovery procedures

runbooks_exist_usable.evidence: 6 runbooks in ops/runbooks/ with consistent structure

hard_declarations: Incidents become manageable events, not surprises
